snippet: A man hurls insults at Anthony D. Weiner, a Democratic candidate for mayor, and a shouting match ensues.
abstract: Trailside blog; shouting match ensues at campaign stop in Brooklyn bakery, after man begins hurling insults at Anthony D Weiner and his wife Huma Abedin.
lead_paragraph: A man hurls insults at Anthony D. Weiner, a Democratic candidate for mayor, and a shouting match ensues.

headline.print_headline: Weiner vs. Heckler At a Brooklyn Bakery
headline.main: Weiner vs. Heckler at a Brooklyn Bakery
